data.title: Online course Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia
data.meta_description: Keeps lasting memory of the annihilation of Lidice, which was razed to the ground by the German Nazi, June 10, 1942.
data.text:
Get acquainted with the daily life of the inhabitants of the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia through the course.

The course introduces the circumstances of the establishment of the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia to the participants. It also introduces the top politicians of the Protectorate and enables to get to know the life of the inhabitants in this difficult time-period.

A student will gain a brief overview about, how the daily life changed towards people after the implementation of various ordinances, regulations and ubiquitously fear. He will get acquainted the terms as e.g. total deployment, ration cards or time of the darkness.

The students can verify the acquired knowledge in tests in the middle and at the end of the course.

The course is interactive, not accompanied by a lecturer.

The course is identified for pupils of the second degree of primary schools and for students of the secondary schools, or for individual interested persons.

Duration: 30 minutes

Price: 50 CZK / 1 student
